controls.message: Select one or more effects to apply to the card.  Additional settings for the effects are available in the corresponding tab.
Select the pattern of the data cascade animation.
Advanced: Custom animation patterns and keyframes can be defined - please refer to the documentation for more information.
Grid dimensions are calculated automatically by default using the card's size and font size.  Here you can provide specific values to override the automatic settings.

State-based alert presets allow you to apply different alert settings based on the state of the entity/attribue.  If enabled, the following settings will be used to select the alert condition to apply.  Please refer to the documentation for more information.
Note: for convenience 'brightness' attribute is automatically converted from 0-255 to 0-100%.
Select from the Alert Condition presets, or provide custom presets below.
Advanced: Provide your own list of custom alert presets, or customize individual settings of the standard presets.  Please refer to the documentation for more information.
These colours are used by the default alert preset.  If you have selected a custom preset, these colours will not be used.
Use 'custom presets' feature if you would like to change text for the builtin presets.
Select the pattern of the animation.
Advanced: Custom animation patterns and keyframes can be defined - please refer to the documentation for more information.
Grid dimensions are calculated automatically by default using the card's size and font size.  Here you can provide specific values to override the automatic settings.
Select the pattern of the pulsewave animation.
Advanced: Custom animation patterns and keyframes can be defined - please refer to the documentation for more information.
By default, the pulsewave pattern will repeat to fill the width of the card, and scale line lengths to the height of the card.  These settings can be overriden to customize the effect.
